definitions.sensetop: depressed about somethingdepressed at somethingdepressed over somethingdepressed by something

examples.text: You mustn't let yourself get depressed.
She felt very depressed about the future.
He was really depressed at the thought of going into the office.
She was depressed over the recent death of her mother.
I was depressed by our lack of progress.
It makes me depressed just looking at him.
She became severely depressed after her mother's death.
She's terribly depressed about losing her job.

definitions.definition: affected by the medical condition of depression

examples.text: There is medical evidence to show that he is clinically depressed.
She suffers from sleep disturbance and **depressed mood**.

definitions.definition: without enough economic activity or jobs for people

examples.text: They have made little attempt to bring jobs to economically depressed areas.
The shipping trade was badly depressed.

definitions.definition: having a lower amount or level than usual
